title: Flaose
content:
Flaose has returned from 2 years at Peru.

I'll talk him to coming by and saying hi.

title: Re: Flaose
content: I was going to post something to the effect of this being the second anniversary of his departure, and hoping he'd return soon, but decided against it. It's great to hear that he's back, and it'd be wonderful for him to pop in, even if he decides not to return to the community (as I would have thought he would, but you never know).[url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url]

title: Re: Flaose
content:
Wow, has it really been two years already?
He left right after I joined. So I've been here for two years... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] -Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: yay
content: Welcome back, Flaose.

title: Re: yay
content:
Woah, two years already! I can't believe it.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img]

Anyways, great to hear he has safely returned! Hopefully we'll see him around! Welcome back! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: yay
content:
I yet have to see him return, I guess he will but I'll wait for that moment.-----------------
[img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/s/jcw/img/logo_jamster_navi.gif[/img][img]http://www.jamster.co.uk/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Falling.gif[/img]

title: Re: yay
content:
I don't know Flaose yet, but welcome back. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: error
content: Haven't seen him since he stopped by... when I do, I'll send him over if he doesn't do it himself first.

title: Re: error
content:
*poof*

Aha! I had to unpack a few boxes to find my scrambled password (I had written it down) and here I am.--------------------

title: laosef("huzzah");
content:
He lives! This calls for one thing, and one thing only...

MOSH PIT!

title: response
content:
Wha--Moshpit? *Does his imitation of a Foob, turning to run, but smacks headlong into KeenRush, where he explodes in a shower of yellow surprise* *Foob death noise*

How was your trip, Flaose? Do you have pictures?

title: *off topic vermin/poultry (?) deaths*
content:
[hr]Xky *Foob death noise*
[hr]Blast. Another minion down. Hehe, yellow surprise.
